rules_text:
[i]Engage! – [/i]{1}{W}{U} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
[i]Dual Assist – [/i]Whenever Lucina, Emblem of The Exalt engages or whenever you attack a player with exactly two creatures, support 2, then draw a card.
